item.title: OUR SUICIDAL SOCIETY [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ April 04, 2024
On this episode of Liberty Dispatch, hosts Andrew and Matthew cover the tragic reality that Western Civilization has a death wish, evinced by the growth of doctor-assisted suicide in our nation and around the globe. 

[Segment 1] - Autistic Calgarian Woman Set to Kill Herself via Doctor-administered Murder (07:32-24:56):
"Calgary Judge: Woman with Autism Medical Assistance in Dying" | Calgary Herald: https://calgaryherald.com/news/local-news/calgary-judge-woman-with-autism-medical-assistance-in-dying?taid=6601c4559876060001c7282f;
"Canadian Court Rules Woman with Autism Seek Trudeau Government Assisted Suicide" | The Post Millennial: https://thepostmillennial.com/canadian-court-rules-woman-with-autism-seek-trudeau-government-assisted-suicide?utm_content=;
"Calgary Judge Rules Against Father Opposing Euthanasia of Autistic, Non-Terminally Ill Daughter" | LifeSiteNews: https://www.lifesitenews.com/news/calgary-judge-rules-against-father-opposing-euthanasia-of-autistic-non-terminally-ill-daughter;

[Segment 2] - Interview w/Tabitha Ewert on the Legality of MAID (26:00-41:05):
Reach out to your MP concerning MAID: https://easymail.arpacanada.ca/welcome/;

[Segment 3] - The International Death-Cult (42:13-END):
"I'm 28 and I'm Scheduled to Die" | The First Person: https://www.thefp.com/p/im-28-and-im-scheduled-to-die;
"We Can't Afford a Taboo on Assisted Dying" | The Times: https://www.thetimes.co.uk/article/we-cant-afford-a-taboo-on-assisted-dying-n6p8bfg9k

MUST READ BOOKLET on ASSISTED SUICIDE: https://www.endthekilling.ca/product/a-guide-to-discussing-assisted-suicide/;

item.title: LD NEWS BRIEF: 04/02/2024 [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch: NEWS BRIEF ~ April 02, 2024
On this episode of Liberty Dispatch NEWS BRIEF, host Andrew DeBartolo breaks down Canadian news, culture, and politics from a distinctly Christian, Conservative, and Canadian perspective.

item.title: The RCMP is DONE! [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ March 28, 2024
On this episode of Liberty Dispatch, hosts Andrew and Matthew do a deep dive into the recently leaked and heavily redacted RCMP document concerning serious immanent threats to Canada's democracy. Sadly, the document shows that the RCMP's quasi-independence is done; it's over. The RCMP has proven time and time again that they are now agents of the State Regime, and we need to come to terms with that truth and proceed accordingly. 

But do not despair, friends, for Christ has overcome the world, for HE is RISEN! HAPPY EASTER!

[Segment 1] - The Secret RCMP Report (06:20 - 43:12):
"RCMP Whole of Government: Five-Year Trends for Canada" | DocumentCloud: https://s3.documentcloud.org/documents/24512494/rcmp-whole-of-government-five-year-trends-for-canada.pdf;
"Secret RCMP Report Warns Canadians May Revolt Once They Realize How Broke They Are" | National Post: https://nationalpost.com/opinion/secret-rcmp-report-warns-canadians-may-revolt-once-they-realize-how-broke-they-are;
"Secret RCMP Memo Blames Everyone but the Liberals for Canada’s Misery" | LifeSite News: https://www.lifesitenews.com/opinion/secret-rcmp-memo-blames-everyone-but-the-liberals-for-canadas-misery;

[Segment 2] - Analyzing the Report (45:56 - END):

item.description:

On this episode of Liberty Dispatch NEWS BRIEF, host Andrew DeBartolo breaks down Canadian news, culture, and politics from a distinctly Christian, Conservative, and Canadian perspective.

"Conservative Motion of Non-Confidence" | TNC News: https://tnc.news/2024/03/21/conservative-motion-of-non-confidence
